name: CheckMate (MarekRzepka, spartanv)
description:
Game of chess with a twist...

Explore grotesque chess boards!

Avoid chess pieces that can appear any moment!

Find the way out and don't get killed!

Ola Zakrzewska - graphics
Paweł Mazurek - code
Marek Rzepka - code
Wojciech Czesak - sound and level design

Special thanks for to Ellie Abraham for creating our soundtrack !
